name: Dora the Explorer: Dora's World Adventure
description:
Back of Box - Game Boy Advance (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

Join Dora on her first World Adventure!

Pack your backpack for a World Adventure with Dora the Explorer! Dora needs your help to team up with Swiper to return the Friendship Bracelets he swiped to France, Tanzania, Russia, and China! From Mt. Kilimanjaro to the Great Wall of China, get ready to explore the world with Dora!
Come on!
¡Vámonos!


(screenshot captions)
  • Return Friendship Bracelets to N'Dari in Tanzania!
  • Explore Paris and visit The Eiffel Tower!
  • Learn to say "hello" in 4 different languages!
